title: CBS announces NCAA hoops schedule; Terps and Hoyas featured
text:
CBS announces NCAA hoops schedule; Terps and Hoyas featured CBS announced their NCAA basketball TV schedule for this upcoming season on Thursday. Post to Facebook CBS announces NCAA hoops schedule; Terps and Hoyas featured CBS announced their NCAA basketball TV schedule for this upcoming season on Thursday.  //on.wusa9.com/1LvOC7C   Join the Conversation To   CBS announces NCAA hoops schedule; Terps and Hoyas featured WUSA 9 Staff, WUSA 12:23 p.m. EDT October 15, 2015 Feb 28, 2015; College Park, MD, USA; Maryland Terrapins guard Melo Trimble (2) drives to the basket against the Michigan Wolverines at Xfinity Center. Mandatory Credit: Mitch Stringer-USA TODAY Sports (Photo: Mitch Stringer, Mitch Stringer-USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
WASHINGTON (WUSA9) -- CBS has announced their 2015-16 NCAA basketball television schedule for the upcoming season and there is plenty of local flare featured throughout the year. 
The Maryland Terrapins, Georgetown Hoyas and Virginia Cavaliers will make up to eight national broadcast appearances on the network during the upcoming season. 
Here are the games that will be featured on CBS. 
Sat, 1/2 Big Ten Women : Ohio State @ Maryland 
Sat, 1/16 Villanova @ Georgetown
